Windlord:

"I'm going to help, lad" replied the male and he ran where Kup and 
Azure where

-- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup opens a return comm channel to Windlord.
> 
> Kup(via commlink): I have. As soon as Azure gets out of my vehical 
> mode and goes to help Nightlight, I'll come help you with those 
pods. 
> Kup out.
> 
> Kup shuts down the channel, waiting for Azure to get out of his 
truck 
> bed so he could transform.
>
